headline: A Look At First Solar (FSLR) Valuation After A Strong Year And Mixed Short-Term Returns
summary: Recent performance snapshot First Solar (FSLR) has attracted attention from many investors after a mixed period, with the stock remaining roughly flat over the past month while gaining 7.3% over the past week. See our latest analysis for First Solar. At a share price of US$242.15, First Solar’s recent 7.3% 7 day share price return sits against a softer 90 day share price return of 7% and a much stronger 1 year total shareholder return of 58.4%. This suggests momentum has cooled in the short...
